snippet: A stalled farm bill that reshapes nutrition and agriculture programs could contribute billions of dollars in savings, lawmakers say.
abstract: Several lawmakers say that stalled farm bill that reshapes nutrition and agriculture programs through steep spending cuts could contribute billions of dollars in savings; are trying to persuade Obama administration and Congressional leaders to include measure in negotiations over deficit reduction.
lead_paragraph: A stalled farm bill that reshapes nutrition and agriculture programs could contribute billions of dollars in savings, lawmakers say.

headline.seo: Stalled Farm Bill Could Help With Deficit Reduction
headline.main: Stalled Farm Bill Is Pushed for Its Savings
headline.print_headline: Stalled Farm Bill Is Pushed for Its Savings
